summary:
The Security Council,
Reaffirming previous resolutions 1576 (2004), 1542 (2004), and 1529 (2004), 
Determining the situation in Haiti remains a threat to international peace and security,
Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,
1. Extends MINUSTAH's mandate, as per resolution 1542 (2004), until 24 June 2005, with intention of further renewal;
2. Welcomes the Secretary-General's report (S/2005/313);
3. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
